scripts.build:sass: npx sass src/scss/styles.scss build/site/styles.css && npx sass src/scss/app.scss build/site/static/css/app.css
scripts.build:static: mkdir -p build/site/static && (cd ./src/static && rsync -a .  ../../build/site/static/.) && rsync -a assets build/site/static/.
scripts.build:client: npm run build:static && npm run build:sass && npx esbuild src/ts/app/client.ts --bundle --outfile=build/site/client.js
scripts.build:songs: npm run build:static && npm run build:sass && npx esbuild src/ts/songs/song-client.tsx --bundle --outfile=build/site/song-client.js
scripts.build:app: npm run build:static && npm run build:sass && npx esbuild src/ts/app/app.tsx --bundle --outfile=build/site/static/js/app.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:client && npm run build:app
scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run build:songs
